abstract: The Japanese electronics giant threw in the towel on its HD DVD technology, announcing that it would no longer develop, produce or market disc players for the format.
snippet: The Japanese electronics giant threw in the towel on its HD DVD technology, announcing that it would no longer develop, produce or market disc players for the format.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO  The biggest consumer electronic format war in a generation is officially over.

headline.main: Toshiba Concedes Defeat in the DVD Battle
headline.print_headline: Toshiba Gives Up, and Blu-ray Wins the DVD Format Fight
